name: privacy_service
author: Peter Nolan
meta_keywords: Adobe, Experience Platform, Privacy Service, GDPR, documentation, API, developers

pages.title: Privacy Service overview
pages.description: Privacy Service provides a RESTful API and user interface that allow you to make data access and delete requests that comply with privacy regulations.

pages.title: Privacy Service API tutorial
pages.description: Create and manage data access and delete requests that comply with privacy regulations using APIs

pages.title: Privacy Service UI tutorial
pages.description: Create and manage data access and delete requests that comply with privacy regulations using the UI

pages.title: Identity data for privacy requests
pages.description: Learn how to leverage Adobe technologies to retrieve identity information for customer privacy requests.

pages.title: Subscribe to Privacy Events
pages.description: Privacy Events are notifications that leverage Adobe I/O events, signalling when certain points in the job request lifecycle are reached.

pages.title: Privacy request processing in Adobe Experience Platform
